settings.title: Compatible Device
settings.content:
XbotGo is compatible with smartphones that feature either Qualcomm Snapdragon 888 CPU or newer processors and Apple A12 CPU or newer processors. Here are the recommended phone models that meet these criteria:

  • Apple:
    iPhone 11 or later models
  • Samsung:
    Samsung Galaxy S21/S22/S23 series, Galaxy Z Flip3, Z Flip4, Samsung W22, W23 Flip
  • Google:
    Google Pixel 7/7Pro, Pixel 8
  • Huawei:
    Huawei Mate 40/Mate 50 series, Huawei P50/P60 series
  • Xiaomi:
    Xiaomi 11/12/13/14 series
  • OnePlus:
    OnePlus 9/10/11/12 series, OnePlus Ace Pro
  • Sony:
    Xperia PRO-I, Xperia 1 III, Xperia 1 ‚Ö£, Xperia 5 III, Xperia 5 ‚Ö£

settings.title: What features does XbotGo Chameleon offer?
settings.answer:
XbotGo Chameleon is not your ordinary phone mount. It is packed with incredible features that will transform the way you capture and experience sports. Here's what it offers:

1. Auto-Tracking Functionality: With dual cameras and advanced AI technology, XbotGo Chameleon provides auto-tracking for over 20 sports. It intelligently follows the action, ensuring you never miss a moment.

2. Precise Key Player Tracking: The AI-powered system enables precise tracking of key players. It identifies athletes based on appearance, body shape, jersey number, and more, delivering accurate and detailed footage.

3. Versatile Scene Tracking: XbotGo Chameleon adapts to different sports environments with its versatile scene tracking capabilities. Whether you're capturing a fast-paced game or a graceful dance routine, it adjusts accordingly to ensure optimal footage.

4. XbotGo App Enhancements: Seamlessly control and enhance your recording experience with the XbotGo App. Enjoy features like auto-highlight generation, which automatically creates exciting highlights from your footage. Live streaming is also made easy, allowing you to share your sporting moments in real-time, without any monthly fees.

5. Superior Video Quality: The XbotGo Chameleon system delivers stunning video quality up to 4K resolution. Every detail and movement will be captured with exceptional clarity, bringing your sports recordings to life.

6. Extended Battery Life: Capture all the action without worrying about power limitations. XbotGo Chameleon boasts an extended battery life of up to 8 hours, ensuring you can record for extended periods without interruptions.

Experience the future of sports recording with XbotGo Chameleon. Visit our Kickstarter campaign to learn more and secure your own AI-powered sports cameraman.

settings.title: Which bundle should I choose?
settings.answer:
Tailor your choice based on your filming requirements:
If you already own a tripod, the Standard Bundle is a perfect fit as the Chameleon is compatible with all 1/4-inch screw tripods.

For outdoor filming on expansive fields like soccer or football, we recommend the Elite Pro Bundle. Its 13-foot T4 tripod offers a professional tracking perspective.

If you prioritize convenience and portability and mainly film indoor activities like dance, yoga, or fencing, choose the Portable Bundle. It includes a compact 4-foot tripod for easy handling.

If you encounter diverse shooting scenarios, the All-Inclusive Bundle is your go-to option. It includes two tripod choices suitable for any setting

settings.title: What is the difference between Chameleon and its previous Gen 1 modle?
settings.answer: In essence, the Chameleon comes with an ultrawide-angle camera and advanced AI processor. This combination ensures superior tracking performance, improved zoom capabilities, and exceptional picture quality, enabling seamless 4K video recording. Additionally, it offers an extended battery life of up to 8 hours and enhanced heat resistance for mobile devices.

settings.title: How many sports does the XbotGo Chameleon support?
settings.answer:
XbotGo Chameleon covers over 20 types of sports, namely:
1.Soccer
2.Football
3.Flag Football
4.Lacrosse
5.Ice Hockey
6.Tennis
7.Volleyball
8.Beach Volleyball
9.Badminton
10.Rugby
11.Futsal
12.Basketball
13.Power Soccer
14.Table Tennis
15.Figure Skating
16.Pickleball
17.Boxing
18.Fencing
19.Gymnastic
20.Taekwondo
Some of the sports mode might be delivered later via app updates.
